label: specifiedAllowanceCharge
comment: A component of pricing, such as an allowance or charge for trade purposes.

rangeIncludes.comment: A component of pricing, such as an allowance or charge for trade purposes.

domainIncludes.comment: The information, at a line level, that enables the reconciliation of a financial transaction with the item(s) that the financial transaction is intended to settle, for example a commercial invoice.

The information, at a subordinate line level, that enables the reconciliation of a financial transaction with the item(s) that the financial transaction is intended to settle, for example a commercial invoice.
The information, at a header level, that enables the reconciliation of a financial transaction, with the item(s) that the financial transaction is intended to settle, such as a commercial invoice.
